name: Quill Interactions: Stone Age Racing
description:
Stone Age Racing is a new Interactive Quill app for the Oculus Quest and Quest2.  Stone Age Girl is giving you a chance to test your driving skills with her own race car in a challenging timed circuit race! You can check out Stone Age Girl driving at Oculus Theater at Stone Age Race Car.

You can see the full circuit run in this video: Full Race Circuit

Music by Fesliyan Studios.
